login.instructions: Log in to the WebAuthn Starter Kit to continue
login.trusted-device-button: Continue with Trusted Device or Security Key

forgot-step.instructions: Enter a recovery code to continue.

trusted-device.header: Log in faster on this device
trusted-device.instructions: Trust this device? This will allow you to log in next time using this device's fingerprint or face recognition.
trusted-device.ask-prompt: Don't want to register this device?
trusted-device.ask-never: Never ask me to register this device
trusted-device.success-message: You have successfully registered your trusted device

registration.instructions: Log in to the WebAuthn Starter Kit to continue
registration.add-key-prompt: Security keys are the primary authentication factor
registration.add-key-1: Make sure your Security Key is nearby
registration.add-key-2: Follow the steps in the browser
registration.add-key-3: Give your Security Key a nickname to easily identify it later
registration.success-prompt: You have successfully registered your Security Key
registration.success-instructions: Give your security key a nickname

credential.usernameless-label: Enable usernameless login with this key
credential.usernameless-note: Note: Passwordless requires a FIDO2 device and a browser that it

delete.modal-note: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain.

recovery-codes.body-text: Protect your recovery codes as you would a password. We recommend saving them in a safe spot, such as password manager.
recovery-codes.body-warning: If you lose you all your authenticators and don't have the recovery codes you will lose access to your account.
recovery-codes.generate-new-codes: Please generate new Recovery Codes now.
recovery-codes.save-codes: Save your recovery codes now. They will not be shown again
recovery-codes.all-codes-used: All Recovery Codes have been used. Please generate new Recovery Codes now.
recovery-codes.generate-codes-text: When you generate new recovery codes, you must copy them to a safe spot. Your old codes will not work anymore.
